Home

Welcome to the homepage of the Supernova models project.

This project is a collection of supernova models from various groups around the world. The models are stored in a common format and are available for download. The project is hosted by the Max Planck Institute for Astrophysics.

For more information, please see the GitHub repository.

Currently v1.0.0
